item.title: Achievements
item.author: Salvatore Abello
item.description: [TeamItaly 2023 - now] I have been selected to be part of TeamItaly: the national cybersecurity team, where the most talented individuals will have the opportunity to represent the country in various international cybersec competitions. Here you can find our results. [ECSC 2023 - 2024] Every year, each country chooses 10 participants to compete in the European Cyber â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹Security Challenge (ECSC). [Internet Festival CTF Finals 2023] I partecipated the IFCTF 2023 finals with FoocHackz.

item.title: Whoami
item.author: Salvatore Abello
item.description: Hi! I’m Salvatore Abello and I’m a computer science student and a cybersec enthusiast. I’m also a CTF player in various teams like @mhackeroni, @Pwnzer0tt1, @TRX and other smaller teams. I’m intrested in Web Security, especially when it comes to finding and exploiting weird behavior in libraries or products. I also love breaking Python Sandboxes (pyjails) ðŸ˜€ Cybersecurity is not the only thing that interests me! You can find some of my projects here.
